data.name: ES5 Generators(iii)
data.description:
This is the third part of three ([part1](http://www.codewars.com/kata/es5-generators-i), [part2](http://www.codewars.com/kata/es5-generators-ii)).

Given the implementation of this functions (they are preloaded and it is not necessary to implement them):

```javascript
//generator
function generator(sequencer) {
   ...
}

//sequencers
function factorialSeq() {...} // 1, 1, 2, 6, 24, ...
function fibonacciSeq() {...} // 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 12, ...
function rangeSeq(start, step) {...} // rangeSeq(1, 2)  -> 1, 3, 5, 7, ...
function primeSeq() {...} // 1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, ...
partialSumSeq(1, 3, 7, 2, 0) {...} // 1, 4, 11, 13, 13, end

//pipes
function accumulator() {...} // var ac = accumulator() ac(1) -> 1, ac(4) -> 5, ac(2) -> 7
function isEven(){...} // var ie = isEven(); ie(1) -> {status: false, number:1}, ie(4) -> {status: true, number:4}
function printEven(prefix){...} // var pe = printEven('The number'); pe({status: false, number:1}) -> "The number 1 is not even.", pe({status: true, number:4}) -> "The number 4 is even."
```

We want to limit the infinite sequencers like `factorialSeq`. By doing this, we get an error if the limit is exceeded as in finite sequences.

You should implement the `addLimit(limiter)` method in `pipeSeq()` function to limit infinite sequences. This method receives a limiter function and some optionals arguments passed to the limiter.

For example, we can limit the prime sequence like this:

```javascript
var pipedSeq = pipeSeq(primeSeq)
      .addLimit(stepLimiter, 2) // limits the prime sequencer to two numbers
      .invoke();
    
var seq = generator(pipedSeq);
seq.next(); // 1
seq.next(); // 2
seq.next(); // Error
```

`stepLimiter` is a function that receives the max number elements in the sequence and returns something? that allows to you limit the sequence (I do not want give to you more details).

There is another limiter function to implement, `resultLimiter`, that lmits the sequence by its returned value.

The same `pipedSeq` object can have more than one pipe and more than one filter.
